action.action-desc: Mr. Cohen (for himself, Mr. Meeks, Mr. Danny K. Davis of Illinois, Mr. Ellison, Ms. Lee of California, and Ms. Norton) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to allow a local educational agency that receives a subgrant under section 2121 of such Act to use the funds to provide professional development activities that train school personnel about restorative justice and conflict resolution.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Restorative Justice in Schools Act of 2013.
